name: Nordic Curl
how_to_perform:
1. Start in a position with your body supported by your hands, placed shoulder-width apart on the ground and your feet together.
2. Engage your core by pulling your belly button towards your spine.

3. Inhaling deeply, slowly draw your knees up towards your chest while keeping your upper body still.
4. As you exhale, lower your knees back down to the starting position in a smooth, controlled motion.
5. Continue this movement for the desired number of repetitions or time duration.
short_summary: Nordic curls are an exercise that targets the muscles in the core and hip flexors by drawing knees up towards the chest and lowering them back down.
